description: Scots persnickety, whence also the form English pernickety.

adjectives.description: persnickety (comparative more persnickety, superlative most persnickety)

examples: Marjorie glanced up and down the long street. “Well, I never in my life saw so many different kinds of houses!” she exclaimed. “Aren’t they funny! Why, they look almost like people. Look at that little persnickety one over there — the white, white one with the green, green blinds — doesn’t it look exactly like —”
